markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tail Spin](/Feats.aspx?ID=1004) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Goblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=81" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 38 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Tailed Goblin](/Heritages.aspx?ID=37) heritage; [Hard Tail](/Feats.aspx?ID=1001)

</column>

---

You excel at using your tail as a weapon to upend your foes. Attempt a single [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to Trip up to two adjacent creatures. If you roll a success against a target, you get a critical success against that target instead.
name: Tail Spin
